article_node.title: Stock market is in best investing environment ever: BlackRock's $2.4 trillion CIO
article_node.summary: Rick Rieder, BlackRock’s CIO of global fixed income, argues that equities are in the best investing environment ever, citing a $7 trillion cash pile in money markets, record corporate buybacks, and a strong earnings beat rate of 81% among S&P 500 firms. He expects the Fed to cut rates in September, potentially by a full percentage point, and sees tech-driven productivity gains as a catalyst for higher growth. Despite rising bearish sentiment in the AAII survey, Rieder remains bullish, noting that tech valuations are not overly concerning given earnings growth and that the market’s supply-demand dynamics are favorable.
